description.narrative: The Millennium Challenge Corporation's Board of Directors has approved a five-year, $434 million compact with the Government of Republic of the Philippines aimed at reducing poverty through economic growth. The compact is intended to support reforms and investments to modernize the Bureau of Internal Revenue, expand and improve a community-driven development project, Kalahi-CIDSS, and rehabilitate a secondary national road in Samar province.
